/* DbMapper.selectTableInfo */ SELECT t.TABLE_SCHEMA , t.TABLE_NAME , c.ORDINAL_POSITION , c.COLUMN_NAME , concat(t.TABLE_NAME, '.', c.COLUMN_NAME) as "KEY" , c.COLUMN_TYPE , c.COLUMN_KEY , c.IS_NULLABLE, EXTRA , c.COLUMN_COMMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES t left join INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS c on t.TABLE_SCHEMA = c.TABLE_SCHEMA and t.TABLE_NAME = c.TABLE_NAME WHERE t.TABLE_SCHEMA='sample'
and t.TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' ORDER BY t.TABLE_SCHEMA, t.TABLE_NAME, c.ORDINAL_POSITION
